professionalExperience.title: Associate Consultant
responsibilities: Developed and maintained scalable, efficient, and modular front-end code for customer-facing e-commerce applications using React JS.
Designed and implemented user interfaces for business-sensitive consumer portals, enhancing user experience and engagement.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams throughout the SDLC to ensure cohesive and efficient project development.
Ensured adherence to coding standards, conducted unit testing, and participated in code reviews to maintain high-quality code.
Designed and implemented CICD pipelines, streamlining development cycles and deployment processes.
Performed platform integrations using REST to enhance data flow and system interoperability.
Ensured cross-browser compliance by writing clean HTML and Sass/CSS code, working closely with UX and Visual Designers.
Worked with server technologies, primarily NPM, to enhance application functionality and performance.
Built features and services with a focus on reliability, optimizing application uptime and performance.
